action.action-desc: Mr. Foster (for himself and Mr. LoBiondo) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To require a per capita calculation for eligibility of a jurisdiction to participate in the EPSCoR program of the National Science Foundation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Smarter EPSCoR Act.

section.header: Per capita calculation for eligibility of a jurisdiction to participate in EPSCoR
section.text: In determining the eligibility of a jurisdiction to participate in the Established Program to Stimulate Competitive Research program described under section 517 of National Science Foundation Authorization Act of 2010 (42 U.S.C. 1862pâ€“9), the Director of the National Science Foundation shall ensure that the proportion of the total amount of National Science Foundation research support attributed to a jurisdiction over a 3-year period is calculated on a per capita basis.
